Html:
I am attempting to extend this control in order to allow for an Enumeration to be used as an axis, I checked on the forum here, and apparently there were plans to create this functionality, but I'm not seeing it as of yet.

 

What I am trying to figure out is what classes I need to create, I'm sure a LabelProvider and a TicksProvider and the Axis itself, and probably a string to double converter that will just return the enumeration index.

 

Is there anything else that will be necessary to implement? and I assume these should all implement the interfaces currently present in the solution

 

Thanks,

Brian
